document.full_text: novak djokovic continued his domination over world number one rafa nadal ahead of the french open by claiming the rome masters crown 6-4 6-4 on sunday as he stretched his unbeaten run this year to 37 matches.
document.title: djokovic floors nadal again to claim rome title
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic continued his domination over world number one rafa nadal ahead of the french open by claiming the rome masters crown 6-4 6-4 on sunday as he stretched his unbeaten run this year to 37 matches.
